Grocer Vollodos:

Bathis wants the Undead gone from the Swampland.
Target Zombie Forest Elves, Zombie Forest Elf Researchers, Dark Horrors, Lesser Dark Horrors and Stone Giant Soldiers.

I hope you can help us. It will take too long for you to traven to the Swampland on foot.

If you decide to go, I'll teleport you there.
